thread.title: Anonymous Threatens To Leak Donald Trump’s Financial Information That Allegedly Links Him With ‘Russian Mobsters’
thread.title_full: Anonymous Threatens To Leak Donald Trump’s Financial Information That Allegedly Links Him With ‘Russian Mobsters’

author: Jorge Alonso
title: Anonymous Threatens To Leak Donald Trump’s Financial Information That Allegedly Links Him With ‘Russian Mobsters’
text:
Donald Trump may have finally pissed off Anonymous. The hacktivist group which has been mostly quiet throughout the elections has finally broken it’s silence and is issuing a threat to the incoming President. 
. @realDonaldTrump you have financial and personal ties with Russian mobsters, child traffickers, and money launderers.
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 
This isn't the 80's any longer, information doesn't vanish, it is all out there. You are going to regret the next 4 years. @realDonaldTrump 
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 


We could care less about Democrats attacking you @realDonaldTrump , the fact of the matter is, you are implicated in some really heavy shit.
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 
Roy Cohen and your daddy aren't here to protect you anymore @realDonaldTrump .
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 


Oh and please tell your interns not to waste money hitting us with your Moldavian bot farm, stay frosty @realDonaldTrump .
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 

The Group wanted to reiterate that this wasn’t a partisan issue but an effort to stop global fascism. 
A message to those that want us to "help against Trump" our target isn't solely Trump but fascism itself world wide. #Anonymous 
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 


We are not your personal army. We are not here to serve your political interests. We are not patriotic or care about your State. #Anonymous 
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017 
What we care about is human rights, dignity, and liberty to exist in safety. We do not care about your political needs or failed government.
— Anonymous (@YourAnonCentral) January 16, 2017
